[[Boomerang CEE+EMEA|Boomerang (Poland)]] | subsid = | homepage = | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System Poland''' is one Turner's divisions in Europe and one of Turner's divisions in Central and Eastern Europe.
